attributes.action: Allow all gyms across Wales to remain open during the ‘firebreak lockdown’.
attributes.additional_details: As contraction rates are so minimal from gyms at 0.34 per 100,000k visits. This is exactly why.
attributes.background: Allows gyms to remain open for business, during the firebreak lockdown. Keep all measures in place, like you are with supermarkets etc..

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/
